Name: INFORMATION_THEORY
Description: Data can be measured in bits; Noise is error | Entropy/Redundancy

Description: Air moves faster over curved wing -> Lift (Bernoulli) | Fluid Dynamics

Description: Earth's crust moves on magma; Continents drift | Geophysics

Name: ELECTRON
Description: Electricity is made of particles | Subatomic Physics

Name: RELATIVITY
Description: Time and Space are linked; E=mc^2 | Spacetime/Mass-Energy Equivalence

Name: QUANTUM_MECHANICS
Description: Energy comes in packets; Probability rules matter | Wave-Particle Duality

Name: NUCLEAR_FISSION
Description: Splitting atom releases massive energy | Mass Defect

Name: SMELTING
Description: Green stones in Kiln turn into red metal | Reduction

Name: DOMESTICATION
Description: Animals can be tamed for food and work | Symbiosis

Name: COMPASS_LODESTONE
Description: Magnetized needle floats North | Magnetism

Name: GUNPOWDER
Description: Sulfur+Charcoal+Saltpeter | Rapid Oxidation

Name: IRON_SMELTING
Description: High temp fire melts iron | Reduction

Name: ZERO
Description: Symbol for nothing allows complex math | Positional Notation

Name: FERMENTATION
Description: Grain bubbles and changes taste | Anaerobic Digestion

Name: SALT_CURING
Description: Salt dries meat and stops rot | Dehydration

Name: HELIOCENTRISM
Description: Planets orbit Sun (not Earth) | Gravity/Orbital Mechanics

Name: NEWTON_PHYSICS
Description: Laws of Motion and Gravity | Determinism

Name: GAS_LAWS
Description: Pressure * Volume = Constant (Boyle) | Thermodynamics

Name: ATOMIC_THEORY
Description: Matter is made of discrete particles | Discreteness

Name: THERMODYNAMICS_1ST
Description: Energy cannot be created or destroyed | Conservation of Energy

Name: ELECTROMAGNETIC_INDUCTION
Description: Moving magnet creates current | Field Interaction

Name: GERM_THEORY
Description: Microorganisms cause rot and disease | Microbiology

Name: PERIODIC_TABLE
Description: Elements arranged by atomic weight show patterns | Periodicity

Name: MENDELIAN_GENETICS
Description: Traits are inherited via discrete units | Statistical Probability

Name: NITROGEN_CYCLE
Description: Bacteria fix nitrogen; Legumes restore soil | Chemical Cycle

Name: VACCINATION
Description: Cowpox protects against Smallpox | Immunology

Name: ANESTHESIA
Description: Ether/Chloroform blocks pain | Nervous System Suppression

Name: ELECTROMAGNET
Description: Current in coil creates magnet | Electromagnetism
